effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that summons a Storm Elemental for 7.2 sec. Casting Ascendance always hits a Jackpot!
Set: When you summon or extend your Storm Elemental, your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, and Lava Burst deal 30% increased damage for 8 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 7,441 to 9,095 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 276 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Intellect by 2,029, up to 10,145.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 2.1 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.
Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,399 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
